headline.main: Great Losses" in Karelia; ALL FINNISH DRIVES FAIL, SOVIET SAYS

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, June 30 (U.P.) -- All day yesterday, a war communique said today, German and Finnish forces hammered at the Soviet border on the Karelian Isthmus, scene of the decisive battles in the Russian-Finnish war, "but Invariably they were forced to withdraw with great losses owing to the fire and counter-attacks of our troops."
